// <auto-generated/>
#nullable enable
using System;

namespace TestNamespace;
partial class TestClass
{
    /// <summary>
    /// This is a non-try variant of <see cref="TestClass.TryMethod(ref int, in ReadOnlySpan<int>, out string)"/>.
    /// </summary>
    /// <remarks>This was auto-generated.</remarks>
    internal string Method(ref int x, in ReadOnlySpan<int> span)
    {
        if (TryMethod(ref x, in span, out var value))
        {
            return value;
        }

        throw new InvalidOperationException();
    }
}
